headlines.description: Wolves boosted their hopes of qualifying for the Champions League with a 3-0 home win over Everton in the Premier League on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves cruise past Everton to boost UCL hopes

headlines.description: Aston Villa's Trezeguet scored a brace against Crystal Palace to revive his club's hopes of avoiding relegation from the Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Trezeguet double gives Villa lifeline win over Palace

headlines.description: Toby Alderweireld scored a late winner for Spurs to secure a 2-1 victory against Arsenal in the north London derby on Sunday.

video.headline: Arsenal's faint UCL chances 'ended' after loss to Spurs

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL (Arsenal's faint UCL chances 'ended' after loss to Spurs) 2020/07/12 GLOBAL

headlines.shortLinkText: Late Alderweireld goal sees Spurs sink Arsenal

headlines.description: Bournemouth breathed life into their Premier League survival bid on Sunday, coming from a goal down to beat fourth-placed Leicester City.

video.headline: Burley: Leicester the team to crack in battle for UCL spots

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC EPL FCTV (Burley: Leicester the team to crack in battle for UCL spots) 2020/7/12 Global

headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth boost survival hopes as they stun Leicester
